id: scenario-autonomous-entity-worker-scenarios-individual-personal growth trajectory becomes visible and owned
title: Personal growth trajectory becomes visible and owned
description: Personal growth trajectory becomes visible and owned
content:
Scenario: Personal growth trajectory becomes visible and owned
    Given Emma has demonstrated supply chain optimization genius over 6 months
    And the REA system has documented her 23% waste reduction
    When Emma views her growth trajectory dashboard
    Then she sees her optimization pattern recognition abilities documented
    And she sees skill tokens accumulating toward higher roles
    And she discovers teaching opportunities based on her expertise
    And she can pursue cross-training based on witnessed interests
    And her development path is self-determined, not management-assigned
